com.google.android.apps.common.testing.ui.espresso.base

Enum UiControllerImpl.IdleCondition

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<UiControllerImpl.IdleCondition>
      • com.google.android.apps.common.testing.ui.espresso.base.UiControllerImpl.IdleCondition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<UiControllerImpl.IdleCondition>
    Enclosing class:
    UiControllerImpl

    static enum UiControllerImpl.IdleCondition
extends Enum<UiControllerImpl.IdleCondition>
    Responsible for signaling a particular condition is met / verifying that signal.
